description: Homepage: creates the website's home page. It contains a slideshow and a fixed navigation bar, which contains authentication fields.

methods.name: updateFromDB
methods.docblock: If the database is populated, this function populates the component's state with the projects in the database.
methods.description: If the database is populated, this function populates the component's state with the projects in the database.

description: ProjectDisplay: Contains the main components of this class (slideshow and slide counter), wrapped in a div tag.
ProjectItem: Component that contains all of a given project's information: name, authorList, and description.
Description: A given project's description component.
AuthorList: List of a given project's authors' names component, in which names are joined by commas.
NavBar: Navigation bar component, which contains authentication fields (for usernames and passwords).
PrevButton: Backwards-facing arrow button component, which controls the slide that is displayed.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.docblock: If the button is clicked, the current slide index will be reduced by 1.
methods.description: If the button is clicked, the current slide index will be reduced by 1.

description: NextButton: Forwards-facing arrow button component, which controls the slide that is displayed.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.docblock: If the button is clicked, the current slide index will be increased by 1.
methods.description: If the button is clicked, the current slide index will be increased by 1.
